channel.title: Map won't load
channel.description: I am stuck at a point where it won't load the next map. It tries, it says "loading", but then the game reverts to the last save. I tried re-installing the game to no avail. Attached is the console output right after it happens. BlackMesaBug.txt (14.6 KB)

item.title: Map won't load
item.dc:creator: sdouc
item.description:
I am stuck at a point where it won’t load the next map. It tries, it says “loading”, but then the game reverts to the last save. I tried re-installing the game to no avail.
Attached is the console output right after it happens.

BlackMesaBug.txt (14.6 KB)
